00010 #ifndef _COW_LIST_H__
00011 #define _COW_LIST_H__
00012 
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include <memory>
00015 
00017 
00018 // This class holds the array of elements
00019 // and can give out read-only handles to that array.
00020 // Once the handle is given it will hold a snapshot of the list
00021 // with exactly same elements that were in the list at that time
00022 // even if the changes were made to the original list
00023 template<class T>
00024 class cow_wrapper
00025 {
00026 public:
00027         typedef T type;
00028         typedef std::shared_ptr<type> shared_type;
00029 
00031 
00033         class snapshot
00034         {
00035         public:
00036                 snapshot(const cow_wrapper<T>& w)
00037                         : m_object(w.m_object)
00038                 { }
00039 
00040                 const type& operator*() const
00041                 {
00042                         return *m_object.get();
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 const type* operator->() const
00046                 {
00047                         return m_object.get();
00048                 }
00049 
00050         private:
00051                 shared_type m_object;
00052         };
00053 
00055 
00056         cow_wrapper() 
00057                 : m_object(new type()) 
00058         { }
00059 
00060         template<class P1>
00061         cow_wrapper(P1&& p1) 
00062                 : m_object(new type(std::forward<P1>(p1))) 
00063         { }
00064 
00065         template<class P1, class P2>
00066         cow_wrapper(P1&& p1, P2&& p2) 
00067                 : m_object(new type(std::forward<P1>(p1), std::forward<P2>(p2))) 
00068         { }
00069 
00070         template<class P1, class P2, class P3>
00071         cow_wrapper(P1&& p1, P2&& p2, P3&& p3) 
00072                 : m_object(new type(std::forward<P1>(p1), std::forward<P2>(p2), std::forward<P3>(p3))) 
00073         { }
00074 
00075         snapshot get_snapshot() const
00076         {
00077                 return snapshot(*this);
00078         }
00079 
00080         type& operator*()
00081         {
00082                 pre_modify();
00083                 return *m_object.get();
00084         }
00085 
00086         type* operator->()
00087         {
00088                 pre_modify();
00089                 return m_object.get();
00090         }
00091 
00092         const type& operator*() const
00093         {
00094                 return *m_object.get();
00095         }
00096 
00097         const type* operator->() const
00098         {
00099                 return m_object.get();
00100         }
00101 
00102 private:
00103 
00104         void pre_modify()
00105         {
00106                 if(m_object.unique())
00107                         return;
00108                 type* old = m_object.get();
00109                 m_object.reset(new type(*old));
00110         }
00111 
00112         shared_type m_object;
00113 };
00114 
00116 
00117 template<class T, class Cont = std::vector<T> >
00118 class cow_container
00119 {
00120 public:
00121         cow_container() { }
00122         cow_container(const cow_container& other) : m_wrapper(*other.m_wrapper) { }
00123         size_t size() const { return m_wrapper->size(); }
00124 private:
00125         cow_wrapper<Cont> m_wrapper;
00126 };
00127 
00129 
00130 #endif
